mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lib_member( library_no, libmember_name, libmember_adress, libmember_phone, libmember_state ) VALUES ( #{libraryNo}, #{libmemberName}, #{libmemberAdress}, #{libmemberPhone}, #{libmemberState} )

INSERT INTO book( library_no, bookcategory_no, book_name, book_writer, book_pulisher, book_state ) VALUES ( #{libraryNo}, #{bookcategoryNo}, #{bookName}, #{bookWriter}, #{bookPulisher}, #{bookState} )
